overview.heading: Glendora Virtual Office
overview.body: Enjoy the benefits of a business address in Glendora without the financial obligations that accompany a physical office. Opus VO provides an exclusive opportunity to situate your company in a prime Glendora location, all devoid of the high costs associated with a conventional office lease. Take advantage of our state-of-the-art conference rooms for critical business meetings and client interactions, all while amplifying your brand’s prestige with a distinguished Glendora address.  Selecting a virtual office in Glendora through Opus VO offers the special advantage of a live receptionist devoted to delivering custom-tailored, high-quality customer service. Our team guarantees that every client interaction is in harmony with your unique business objectives. Offload everyday administrative tasks such as mail handling and specialized call-forwarding to us, granting you the freedom to direct your attention towards growing your enterprise.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Glendora, California even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Glendora. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within California.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Glendora virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.
